title: SKT Skin
body: Hi, just wonder when will the sky skins be available?

replies.body: Not totally sure!  The patch notes show what skins are aimed for release, at some point during the patch but not necessarily the same day.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for any updates, and hang tight!
New skins usually come out a day or two after the patch.
